description: Number of reversible strings with n beads of 3 colors. If more than 1 bead, not palindromic.
formula: "BHK" (reversible, identity, unlabeled) transform of 3, 0, 0, 0...Conjecture: a(n) = 3*a(n-1)+3*a(n-2)-9*a(n-3) for n>4. G.f.: 3*x*(1-2*x-3*x^2+9*x^3)/((1-3*x)*(1-3*x^2)). [Colin Barker, Apr 02 2012]
author: _Christian G. Bower_
